# VantaHire - AI + Human Expertise. Faster, Fairer Hiring.

## About VantaHire
VantaHire is a hybrid recruitment service that combines AI-powered candidate matching with a trusted network of specialist recruiters. We help startups and enterprises scale faster across India and APAC with the perfect blend of cutting-edge technology and human expertise.

## Core Value Proposition
**AI + Human Expertise. Faster, Fairer Hiring.**

We leverage intelligent technology for smart candidate matching while maintaining the personal touch and industry knowledge of experienced recruitment specialists. Our approach delivers the speed and scale of AI with the irreplaceable insight and empathy of human expertise.

## Geographic Focus
Headquartered in Bangalore, India. Serving companies across India and the Asia-Pacific (APAC) region including Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, and Australia.

## Industries We Serve
- Information Technology (IT)
- Telecommunications
- Automotive
- Financial Technology (Fintech)
- Healthcare

## Services

### For Companies
- AI-powered candidate sourcing and matching
- Access to industry-specialist recruiter network
- Multi-sector hiring expertise across IT, Telecom, Automotive, Fintech, Healthcare
- Accelerated time-to-hire with quality-focused screening
- Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DEI) recruitment practices
- Real-time hiring analytics and insights
- Custom recruitment workflows and pipeline management

### For Job Seekers
- Intelligent job matching powered by AI
- Direct access to vetted opportunities across APAC
- Industry-specialized career guidance from expert recruiters
- Resume optimization and interview preparation
- Access to hidden job market through specialist recruiter network
- Fair, bias-reduced candidate evaluation process

## Target Audience
Startups and enterprises across India and APAC seeking to scale their teams rapidly with high-quality talent. Professionals looking for opportunities in IT, Telecom, Automotive, Fintech, and Healthcare sectors.
